VII.i.2.E.12.c
.
Example:  Claim for Reinstatement of DIC Disallowed
Situation
:  A surviving spouse’s DIC was discontinued on July 1, 2020, due to remarriage on May 1, 2020, at age 54.
The surviving spouse’s claim for reinstatement of DIC was received on November 1, 2020.
Result
:  Disallow the DIC claim.  The surviving spouse remarried at age 54.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Remarriage of a Surviving Spouse
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
